articles.title: 3 fired DOJ workers add to chorus of layoffs in 'foundering' workforce - NPR
articles.description: The Department of Justice has fired hundreds of employees this year, transforming a federal workforce that enjoys vast powers and responsibility over issues affecting the lives of everyday Americans.
articles.content:
This year hundreds of employees at the Justice Department have been fired. Sometimes, because they clash with the Trump administration, and other times, for reasons they don't even know.
Those depar… [+8569 chars]
